name: Great Kaio
description: Great Kaio is the most important Kaio of the Other World and is the God who is responsible for managing the other Kai≈ç to take care of whose sectors of the Galaxy.

originPlanet.name: Planet of the Great Kaio
originPlanet.description: The Planet of the Great Kaio is where the Otherworld Martial Arts Tournament is organized in honor of the death of the North Kaio (Kaito), where powerful warriors participate.
